aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.paragraph: SalesNext is a consulting firm specializing in Salesforce implementation and CRM solutions. We help businesses streamline sales processes, improve customer relationships, and drive growth through customized Salesforce integrations. Our expert team is committed to optimizing operations, boosting productivity, and ensuring long-term success.

hero.title: Your Salesforce Consulting Experts
hero.subtitle: Boost Business Performance with Tailored Solutions
hero.description: SalesNext Consulting provides expert Salesforce implementations and custom solutions to streamline your operations and drive growth.

servicesSection.title: Our Services
servicesSection.paragraph: Your business deserves the best. Our agency provides a wide range of services designed to help you succeed. Our offerings include:

serviceCloud.title: Service Cloud
serviceCloud.paragraph: Service Cloud is Salesforceâ€™s customer service platform that helps businesses deliver exceptional support.

experienceCloud.title: Experience Cloud
experienceCloud.paragraph: Experience Cloud is Salesforceâ€™s platform for creating branded customer experiences through portals and communities. It provides personalized content and self-service options, fostering engagement and loyalty.

salesforceIntegrations.title: Salesforce Integrations
salesforceIntegrations.paragraph: Salesforce integrations connect systems and data sources for streamlined workflows. They enhance data accuracy and insights, automate tasks, and optimize operations for seamless performance.

einsteinAI.title: Einstein AI
einsteinAI.paragraph: Einstein AI is Salesforce's AI platform that enhances customer interactions and informs decisions. It uses machine learning for personalized experiences and actionable insights, empowering teams to make data-driven choices.
